Russia collusion, never happened, even their hand picked guy they were so sure would find them the evidence they needed basically said "No, I found nothing." yet they still pushed the lie. MSM said Trump was profiteering and charging the U.S. for official stays at his hotels, again an investigation showed that never happened, but the MSM continued lying about it. They said Trump only got into politics for the huge amount of money he would make, nope, he is donating his presidential salary to charity, he is making zero money as president, They said he said "Grab em by the pussy" so he admits to groping women without consent, uhhh, kinda, he did say "grab em by the pussy" but that's only part of the quote, the whole quote was "Yea, you know when you're rich, especially if you're rich and good looking, women will let you do anything to them, hug em, kiss em, grab em by the pussy, they just let you do it." he was basically engaging in the rich persons version of locker room jock talk. Now, to address this "...all I see trump doing is tweeting in twitter, but he seems like a good man, also I don't do good in politics" Stop paying attention to twitter, and stop giving so much weight to what someone tweets, no matter who it is, it doesn't matter what he tweets, or who he insults, he's a human being he has flaws like all of us do, what is important is how well he is doing as president, and honestly he isn't doing too bad, before covid hit he had the economy at the highest point it's been for a long while, unemployment was at an all time low, strengthening the border with Mexico is a great idea, I know it won't stop all illegal border crossings but it will certainly slow them down, there are things I do not agree with that he's done, but more and more it seems I'm agreeing with him and his policies.
